messages.title: Student Voice
messages.content: Paul Blomfield - The Choice for Students

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Paul set up the first ever All-Party Group for Students, working with NUS, to give students a strong voice in Parliament.
Opposed tuition fees for undergraduate fees by the Tory/Lib Dem Coalition. He acts for students in Parliament today.
Paul led a seven-year campaign to win the re-introduction of a two-year visa to support work, visa, and internship opportunities.
Has pressed for improved support, together with more investment, to deal with students’ mental health problems.
Has led national calls to end precarious employment in research & improve support for researchers in Parliament.
Paul has campaigned for strong international agreements to cut emissions and led Parliament to declare climate emergency.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Giving you the final say on Brexit
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Labour will give the people a final say over the Brexit impasse, with a choice between a sensible deal and remaining in the EU.

issues.brexitEurope: Labour will give the people a final say over the Brexit impasse, with a choice between a sensible deal and remaining in the EU.
issues.economy: Labour will end low-paid and zero hours jobs. Only a Labour Government will take radical action to tackle it.
issues.education: Our national education service will transform every stage of education from cradle to grave. We’ll restore free education for 16-18 year olds.
issues.environment: Paul has campaigned for strong international agreements to cut emissions and led Parliament to declare climate emergency.
issues.health: Labour will create a fairer economy and rebuild the NHS.
issues.socialWelfare: Years of Conservative-led Governments have created a crisis - housing is unaffordable, too many in low-paid jobs, public services paralysed.

community.content: Housing has become unaffordable: too many in low-paid & insecure work, the NHS, schools, public services being paralysed by Brexit.

leaflet.personalStatement: At a time of failing confidence in politics, Paul has consistently fought for the causes closest to those he represents. He brings students together and listens to their concerns.

politicalExperience.achievements: Strong voice in Parliament, led campaigns for national education service, opposed tuition fees, supported research in Parliament.

quotes.text: "This election is our last chance to radically change course on the climate crisis."

images.caption: Paul has strong support from Sheffield students and has won a reputation in Parliament for taking up their concerns.
